What is the difference between supervisory control and collaborative control?

Think of a task that you do every day that could be made easier with the help of a robot. What mode of interaction would be most appropriate for this task? What are the potential safety concerns?

You now have an appreciation for the human-centered aspects of robotics. You can think critically about how to design robots that are not only functional but also safe and easy for people to use.
  • Define Human-Robot Interaction.
  • List three different ways a human can interact with a robot.
  • Describe a potential safety hazard in a human-robot collaborative task.
